channel.title: How do you make a npc talk?
channel.description: ok when ure playing and u talk, writing comes over your head. well i want to plave party pete somewhere or watever and make him say there are this many players online, or welcome to freescape! how would i go about doing that? please post step by sep im not the best coder.

item.title: How do you make a npc talk?
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

go into npchandler and find “moo” without "'s andcopy it change the npc id and test

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a npc talk?
